participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Curious and creative, Emily enjoys exploring new ideas and is always searching for inspiration.
participant_1.background: I sometimes forget to water my plants, but I'm trying to be better about it. I remember spending hours in my room reading books while my dad worked. I'm not worried about the weather because I have to be ready for any condition when I fly. My car is a convertible, so I can enjoy the sun and the wind in my hair while listening to my favorite music. I'm afraid of not being able to make my juicing bar a success.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: An adventurous spirit, Jake enjoys outdoor activities and has a passion for teaching and sharing knowledge.
participant_2.background: I love to curl up with a good book and lose myself in another world. I love to ski in the winter. I want a home with a secure bike parking space and a place to plug in my tablet. I sell miscellaneous stuff in local fairs. I teach 5th grade students near Oakville, NY.

content.text: What is your favorite way to relax?
I love to curl up with a good book and lose myself in another world.
That sounds nice. I used to read all the time when I was younger.
Me too! I still try to read as often as I can.
What kind of books do you like to read?
I like a variety of genres, but I especially love historical fiction and fantasy.
Me too! I love getting lost in a good story.
What are some of your favorite books?
I love the Outlander series by Diana Gabaldon, and the Lord of the Rings series by J.R.R. Tolkien.
Those are both great series! I've read them both multiple times.
Me too! I'm always up for a reread.
Me too! It's fun to see the books in a new light each time.
What are you reading right now?
I'm currently reading the His Dark Materials series by Philip Pullman.
I've heard good things about that series. I've been meaning to check it out.
